results.content: In the second section, it would have been helpful if there were supporting images to reinforce what he was talking about. The tech stack image that he kept referring to was missing from the text module at the beginning of the section. So I had no visual reference to what he was talking about. Simply showing a person talking is less effective than seeing supporting imagery.
